public class WUMprepConfigEditorJPanel.WUMprepConfigEditorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.FocusListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

The controller class that synchronizes the WUMprepConfigEditorJPanel view with an WUMprepConfiguration model.

Author:
Carsten Pohle

isConfigChanged

public boolean isConfigChanged()
Check whether the configuration has been changed via the GUI. Whenever a component using this WUMprepConfigEditorJPanel saves the underlying WUMprepConfiguration to a file, it should reset the changed status by calling setConfigChanged(false).

Returns:
True if the configuration has been modified by this WUMprepConfigEditorJPanel, else false
See Also:
setConfigChanged(boolean)

removeContextHelpChangeListener

public void removeContextHelpChangeListener(ContextHelpChangeListener l)
Remove a listener for changes of the current context help text.

Parameters:
l - A class implementing the ContextHelpChangeListener interface

setConfigChanged

public void setConfigChanged(boolean configChanged)
Sets the current configChanged status. Use this method to set the configChanged status to false whenever the edited WUMprep configuration gets saved to disk.

Parameters:
configChanged -
See Also:
isConfigChanged()

setConfiguration

public void setConfiguration(WUMprepConfiguration config)
Load a WUMprep configuration into the editor.

Parameters:
config - The configuration to load
